databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.MS_TANAOROSHI_LO_ID , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.MS_VESSEL_ID , MS_VESSEL.VESSEL_NAME , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.MS_LO_ID , MS_LO.LO_NAME , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.SEND_FLAG , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.VESSEL_ID , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.DATA_NO , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.USER_KEY , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.RENEW_DATE , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.TS FROM MS_TANAOROSHI_LO LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_VESSEL ON MS_VESSEL.MS_VESSEL_ID = MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.MS_VESSEL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_LO ON MS_LO.MS_LO_ID = MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.MS_LO_ID

SELECT MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.MS_TANAOROSHI_LO_ID , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.MS_VESSEL_ID , MS_VESSEL.VESSEL_NAME , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.MS_LO_ID , MS_LO.LO_NAME , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.SEND_FLAG , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.VESSEL_ID , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.DATA_NO , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.USER_KEY , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.RENEW_DATE , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.TS FROM MS_TANAOROSHI_LO LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_VESSEL ON MS_VESSEL.MS_VESSEL_ID = MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.MS_VESSEL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_LO ON MS_LO.MS_LO_ID = MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.MS_LO_ID WHERE MS_TANAOROSHI_LO.MS_TANAOROSHI_LO_ID = :MS_TANAOROSHI_LO_ID

INSERT INTO MS_TANAOROSHI_LO ( MS_TANAOROSHI_LO_ID , MS_VESSEL_ID , MS_LO_ID , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES ( :MS_TANAOROSHI_LO_ID , :MS_VESSEL_ID , :MS_LO_ID , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_TANAOROSHI_LO SET MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID , MS_LO_ID = :MS_LO_ID , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID WHERE MS_TANAOROSHI_LO_ID = :MS_TANAOROSHI_LO_ID AND TS = :TS
